AutoVariable.label: Projectile nospread
AutoVariable.tooltip: Projectiles won't have any spread. Independent of aimbot.

AutoVariable.label: Bullet nospread
AutoVariable.tooltip: Bullets won't have any spread. Aimbot independent. (Only works on one bullet per shot).

AutoVariable.label: Center spread
AutoVariable.tooltip: Center the bullet spread cone for a higher hitrate.

AutoVariable.label: Draw step size
AutoVariable.tooltip: Draw inaccuracy of server clock floats (higher = better).

AutoVariable.label: Precision mode
AutoVariable.tooltip: Makes nospread sync slower, but also more accurate and ping resistant.

AutoVariable.label: Use average latency
AutoVariable.tooltip: Use average latency for ping correction instead of current one.

AutoVariable.label: Try to lag compensate
AutoVariable.tooltip: Attempt to compensate for ping. Disable if you miss a lot on low jitter.

LabeledObject.label: Spectator mode
LabeledObject.tooltip: When (if ever) should being spectated disable the nospread? Spectated: disable when anyone is spectating you. Firstperson: disable only when someone is spectating you in first person.

Option.name: Firstperson
Option.tooltip: Disable if at least one spectator is in firstperson.

Option.name: Spectated
Option.tooltip: Disable if you are being spectated in first or thirdperson.
